creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: triangular shaped with 14" center square on silk; embroidered and appliqued in red, green and black with many birds, insects, animals, flowers and one small boatman; cotton background constructed of small triangles in red, blue, green, purple and white sewn in squares; purple lining
title: Baby Carrier
